comments: Note: 'While the character 金 can be pronounced and spelled either as ‘kana’ or ‘kane’ in Japanese, 金平 himself spelled his last name as Kanehira (e.g., Kanehira, 1917, 1936), not Kanahira' (Chung & Hsieh in Taiwania 68(3): 384. 2023).
examples: Buxus intermedia Kaneh. in Formosan Trees, ed. rev. 359. 1936.
isoCountries: Japan, Peru, Papua New Guinea, Philippines
